comment: @CDCgov @DrNancyM_CDC @StateDept .@DrNancyM_CDC: The process has been extremely expedited for #FDA emergency use authorization for #CDC #2019nCoV test #coronavirus #nCoV2019
@CDCgov @DrNancyM_CDC @StateDept .@DrNancyM_CDC: The people who are at higher risk for severe disease & death are those older & have underlying health conditions.#2019nCoV #coronavirus #nCoV2019

@CDCgov @DrNancyM_CDC @StateDept .@DrNancyM_CDC: "We are preparing as if this were the next pandemic."She notes #H1N1 #flu was already on "our doorstep" in 2009.But this time we do have time to prepare#2019nCoV #coronavirus #nCoV2019

@CDCgov @DrNancyM_CDC @StateDept .@DrNancyM_CDC notes #WHO said #2019nCOV is temporary. Waiting on naming convention.She notes there are now 11 airports receive China flights.Right now only 195 under quarantine [those at March]Will have more later. Number of #Wuhan travelers trailing off.#coronavirus

@CDCgov @DrNancyM_CDC @StateDept On quarantining broadly in U.S.:.@DrNancyM_CDC: It's part of #pandemic planning.This was one of the contingencies we've been planning for. #2019nCoV #coronavirus #nCoV2019 #quarantine

@CDCgov @DrNancyM_CDC @StateDept .@DrNancyM_CDC: "This is a horrible situation in China." #CDC scientists strong technical expertise. "In situations like this, science should trump everything else."She had noted other countries also taking aggressive measures, not just U.S.#2019nCoV #coronavirus #nCoV2019

@CDCgov @DrNancyM_CDC @StateDept Q: Where will #CDC put newly quarantined?.@DrNancyM_CDC: Discussions ongoing with state/local health departments. We are making good progress on a plan.Want to make sure they are comfortable.Maybe hotels, military bases, FEMA trailers, etc.#2019nCoV #coronavirus #nCoV2019
@CDCgov @DrNancyM_CDC @StateDept #CDC also now updated its #2019nCoV tracker page: https://t.co/IlY36iPr4x  #coronavirus #nCoV2019

@CDCgov @DrNancyM_CDC @StateDept #science-based decisions?.@DrNancyM_CDC: This is unprecedented situation & taken aggressive measures. Now 17,000# #2019nCoV in China. No immunity, largely expanding outbreak, person to person/community transmission.We have opportunity to slow it down#coronavirus #nCoV2019
